course.title: MAT 3377 Sampling and Surveys (3 units)
course.desc: An introduction to the design and analysis of surveys. Simple random, stratified, proportional, post-stratified, cluster, and multi-stage sampling. Examples and complete theoretical development. Analysis of data using statistical software packages.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: MAT 2375 or MAT 2377 or MAT 2378 or MAT 2379.
